document.full_text: in an exchange with the choice, andrew ferguson recommends that families enjoy the admissions process "while you can,'' as "this experience may be one of the last extended periods of intimacy parents and children will share.''
document.title: questions for 'crazy u' author
lines_and_colors: in an exchange with the choice, andrew ferguson recommends that families enjoy the admissions process "while you can,'' as "this experience may be one of the last extended periods of intimacy parents and children will share.''
